recipes.title: Creamy Broccoli Soup
recipes.summary: A comforting broccoli soup blended with cream and spices.
steps: Sauté onion and garlic until softened.
Add broccoli and broth; simmer until tender.
Blend until smooth and stir in cream.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Strawberry Spinach Salad
recipes.summary: Fresh spinach salad with strawberries and a tangy vinaigrette.
steps: Toss spinach and strawberries in a bowl.
Sprinkle almonds on top.
Drizzle with vinaigrette and serve.

recipes.title: Roasted Tomato Basil Soup
recipes.summary: A classic tomato soup enhanced with roasted tomatoes and fresh basil.
steps: Roast tomatoes with garlic and onion until caramelized.
Blend roasted vegetables with broth.
Simmer and add fresh basil before serving.

recipes.title: Chickpea and Avocado Salad
recipes.summary: A protein-rich salad with chickpeas, avocado, and fresh herbs.
steps: Combine chickpeas, avocado, onion, and parsley.
Drizzle with lemon juice.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Classic Caesar Salad
recipes.summary: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing and croutons.
steps: Toss romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Top with croutons and Parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Chicken Noodle Soup
recipes.summary: A classic chicken noodle soup with tender chicken, vegetables, and egg noodles.
steps: Sauté onion, carrots, and celery until softened.
Add chicken broth and bring to a boil.
Add egg noodles and cook until tender.
Stir in cooked chicken and season to taste.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.summary: A fresh salad with cucumber, tomatoes, olives, feta cheese, and olive oil dressing.
steps: Combine cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, feta, and onion.
Drizzle with olive oil and vinegar.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Butternut Squash Soup
recipes.summary: A smooth, creamy soup made with roasted butternut squash and aromatic spices.
steps: Sauté onion and garlic until softened.
Add roasted squash and vegetable broth.
Simmer and blend until smooth.
Season with nutmeg, salt, and pepper.

recipes.title: Spinach and Strawberry Smoothie
recipes.summary: A refreshing smoothie with spinach, strawberries, and almond milk.
steps: Combine all ingredients in a blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.summary: Simple and delicious avocado spread over toasted bread.
steps: Toast bread slices.
Mash avocado and spread on toast.
Season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes.

recipes.title: Blueberry Oatmeal
recipes.summary: Hearty oatmeal topped with fresh blueberries and a drizzle of honey.
steps: Cook oats with water or milk according to package directions.
Top with blueberries, honey, and cinnamon.

recipes.title: Veggie Omelette
recipes.summary: A fluffy omelette filled with mixed vegetables and cheese.
steps: Whisk eggs and season with salt and pepper.
Cook vegetables in a skillet until softened.
Add eggs and cook until set.
Sprinkle with cheese before folding.

recipes.title: Berry Yogurt Parfait
recipes.summary: Layers of Greek yogurt, fresh berries, and granola.
steps: Layer yogurt, berries, and granola in a glass.
Drizzle with honey before serving.

recipes.title: Grilled Chicken Breast
recipes.summary: Juicy grilled chicken breasts seasoned with herbs and spices.
steps: Brush chicken breasts with olive oil.
Season with garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Grill over medium heat until cooked through.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Chili
recipes.summary: A hearty chili with beans, tomatoes, and spices.
steps: Sauté onion, garlic, and bell pepper until softened.
Add beans, tomatoes, and spices.
Simmer for at least 30 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipes.title: Baked Salmon with Lemon
recipes.summary: Tender salmon fillets baked with lemon slices and herbs.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet.
Top with lemon slices and herbs.
Drizzle with olive oil and season.
Bake for 15-20 minutes until cooked through.

recipes.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.summary: Bell peppers stuffed with rice, ground beef, and spices.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cut tops off peppers and remove seeds.
Brown meat with onion, then stir in rice, tomatoes, and seasoning.
Stuff peppers and bake for 30-35 minutes.

recipes.title: Quinoa and Black Bean Bowl
recipes.summary: A nutritious bowl of quinoa, black beans, vegetables, and avocado.
steps: Combine quinoa, beans, corn, and bell pepper in a bowl.
Top with avocado and cilantro.
Drizzle with lime juice before serving.

recipes.title: Garlic Roasted Potatoes
recipes.summary: Crispy roasted potatoes seasoned with garlic and herbs.
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Toss potatoes with olive oil, garlic, herbs, salt, and pepper.
Roast for 25-30 minutes until golden and crispy.

recipes.title: Steamed Asparagus
recipes.summary: Tender steamed asparagus seasoned simply with lemon and salt.
steps: Trim asparagus ends.
Steam until tender-crisp, about 4-5 minutes.
Season with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.

recipes.title: Brown Rice Pilaf
recipes.summary: Nutty brown rice cooked with vegetables and broth.
steps: Sauté onion, carrot, and celery until softened.
Add rice and broth; bring to a boil.
Cover and simmer until rice is tender.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Sautéed Green Beans with Almonds
recipes.summary: Green beans sautéed with garlic and topped with toasted almonds.
steps: Sauté green beans in olive oil until tender-crisp.
Add garlic and cook 1 minute.
Top with toasted almonds and season.

recipes.title: Fruit Salad with Honey-Lime Dressing
recipes.summary: A refreshing mix of fresh fruits tossed in a honey-lime dressing.
steps: Combine fruits in a large bowl.
Mix lime juice and honey; drizzle over fruit.
Toss gently and chill before serving.

recipes.title: Classic Pancakes
recipes.summary: Fluffy classic pancakes perfect for a hearty breakfast.
steps: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk in milk, egg, and melted butter until smooth.
Cook pancakes on a greased griddle until golden brown.

recipes.title: Spinach and Mushroom Frittata
recipes.summary: A baked frittata packed with spinach, mushrooms, and cheese.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Sauté mushrooms and spinach until wilted.
Beat eggs with cheese, salt, and pepper.
Combine with vegetables and bake until set.

recipes.title: Mango Smoothie
recipes.summary: A tropical smoothie with mango, banana, and orange juice.
steps: Blend all ingredients until smooth.

recipes.title: Iced Green Tea with Mint
recipes.summary: Refreshing iced green tea infused with fresh mint leaves.
steps: Brew green tea and chill.
Add mint leaves and honey if desired.
Serve over ice.

recipes.title: Lemonade
recipes.summary: Classic lemonade made with fresh lemons and sugar.
steps: Mix lemon juice and sugar until dissolved.
Add water and stir.
Serve over ice.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.summary: Classic chewy chocolate chip cookies.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Combine dry ingredients.
Beat butter, sugars, eggs, and vanilla.
Mix in dry ingredients and chocolate chips.
Drop by spoonfuls and bake for 9-11 minutes.

recipes.title: Vanilla Cupcakes
recipes.summary: Soft vanilla cupcakes with buttercream frosting.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix dry ingredients.
Cream butter and sugar, then add eggs and vanilla.
Mix in dry ingredients and milk.
Pour into cupcake liners and bake for 18-20 minutes.

recipes.title: Apple Crisp
recipes.summary: Warm baked apples topped with a crunchy oat topping.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Toss apples with sugar and cinnamon; place in baking dish.
Mix oats, flour, brown sugar, and butter until crumbly.
Sprinkle over apples and bake for 40-45 minutes.

recipes.title: Chocolate Mousse
recipes.summary: Rich and creamy chocolate mousse topped with whipped cream.
steps: Melt chocolate and let cool slightly.
Beat egg yolks with sugar and vanilla.
Fold in melted chocolate.
Whip cream and fold in.
Beat egg whites until stiff and fold in gently.
Chill before serving.

recipes.title: Fruit Tart
recipes.summary: A crisp tart shell filled with pastry cream and topped with fresh fruit.
steps: Fill tart shell with pastry cream.
Arrange fresh fruit on top.
Chill before serving.

recipes.title: Classic Brownies
recipes.summary: Fudgy chocolate brownies with a rich cocoa flavor.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla.
Stir in cocoa, flour, salt, and baking powder.
Pour into a greased pan and bake for 20-25 minutes.

recipes.title: Fruit Popsicles
recipes.summary: Simple homemade fruit popsicles made with blended fruit.
steps: Blend fruit with juice or water and honey if using.
Pour into popsicle molds and freeze until solid.

recipes.title: Peach Cobbler
recipes.summary: Sweet peaches baked with a fluffy biscuit topping.
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Place peaches in a baking dish and sprinkle with sugar.
Mix flour, baking powder, salt, milk, and butter.
Drop batter over peaches and bake for 30-35 minutes.

recipes.title: Fruit and Yogurt Smoothie
recipes.summary: A creamy smoothie with mixed fruit and yogurt.
steps: Blend all ingredients until smooth.

recipes.title: Herb Roasted Chicken
recipes.summary: Whole chicken roasted with fresh herbs and garlic.
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Rub chicken with olive oil, garlic, herbs, salt, and pepper.
Roast for 1 hour 15 minutes or until cooked through.

recipes.title: Gluten-Free Banana Bread
recipes.summary: Moist banana bread made with gluten-free flour.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix bananas, butter, sugar, egg, and vanilla.
Add flour, baking soda, and salt.
Pour into loaf pan and bake for 50-60 minutes.

recipes.title: Roasted Vegetable Medley
recipes.summary: Seasonal vegetables roasted to perfection.
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Toss vegetables with olive oil and seasoning.
Roast for 20-25 minutes until tender.

recipes.title: Classic Hummus
recipes.summary: Creamy hummus made with chickpeas, tahini, and lemon.
steps: Blend all ingredients in a food processor until smooth.

recipes.title: Deviled Eggs
recipes.summary: Classic deviled eggs with a creamy mustard filling.
steps: Slice eggs in half and remove yolks.
Mash yolks with mayonnaise, mustard, salt, and pepper.
Spoon filling into egg whites and garnish with paprika.
